mapper.sql: ID, DJRQ, FJHM, ZXID, ZXRQ, ZXXM, ZT, ZXZ, ZXLX, ZXYH, ZXGH, PWD, TOKENID, ZXJS, dept, ROLE_ID
mapper.select: select a.ID, a.DJRQ, a.FJHM, a.ZXID, a.ZXRQ, a.ZXXM, a.ZT, a.ZXZ, a.ZXLX, a.ZXYH, a.ZXGH, a.PWD, a.TOKENID, a.ZXJS, a.dept , a.ROLE_ID ,b.name as areaname from a left join t_area b on a.dept=b.area_code where ID = #{ID}

select a.DJRQ, a.FJHM, a.ZXID, a.ZXRQ, a.ZXXM, a.ZT, a.ZXZ, a.ZXLX, a.ZXYH, a.ZXGH, a.PWD, a.TOKENID, a.ZXJS, a.dept , a.ROLE_ID, a.ID,b.ROLE_NAME,b.menu_ids from a left join sys_role_front b on a.role_id=b.role_id where tokenid = #{TOKENID}

select a.ZXJS, a.ID, a.DJRQ, a.FJHM, a.ZXID, a.ZXRQ, a.ZXXM, a.ZT, a.ZXZ, a.ZXLX, a.ZXYH, a.ZXGH, a.dept, b.ZMC, a.ROLE_ID, c.NAME, group_concat(d.NAME) as ZXLXNAME, e.NAME as ZXJSNAME, f.name as areaname, g.ROLE_NAME from a left join t_area f on a.dept=f.area_code left join TZXZ b on a.ZXZ=b.ID left join SYS_USER c on a.ZXYH=c.USERNAME left join SYS_DICTIONARIES d on find_in_set (d.DICTIONARIES_ID,a.ZXLX) left join SYS_DICTIONARIES e on a.ZXJS=e.DICTIONARIES_ID left join SYS_ROLE_FRONT g on a.ROLE_ID=g.ROLE_ID where 1=1
and ( a.ZXXM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') or a.ZXYH LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') or c.USERNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') or d.NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') or f.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') or g.ROLE_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%')
)
group by a.ID order by a.ZXID desc

select a.ZXJS, a.ID, a.DJRQ, a.FJHM, a.ZXID, a.ZXRQ, a.ZXXM, a.ZT, a.ZXZ, a.ZXLX, a.ZXYH, a.ZXGH,b.ZMC, a.dept, a.ROLE_ID, f.name as areaname from a left join t_area f on a.dept=f.area_code left join TZXZ b on a.ZXZ=b.ID where 1=1
and a.ZXZ = #{ZXZ}

select a.ZXJS,a.DJRQ,a.FJHM,a.ZXID,a.ZXRQ,a.ZXXM,a.ZT,a.ZXZ,a.ZXLX,a.ZXYH,a.ZXGH,a.PWD,a.ROLE_ID, a.TOKENID,a.ID,a.dept,c.ROLE_NAME from a left join SYS_USER b on a.zxyh=b.USERNAME left join SYS_ROLE c on b.ROLE_ID=c.ROLE_ID where ZXID= #{ZXID}
and ID != #{ID}

select a.ID, a.ZXJS, a.DJRQ, a.FJHM, a.ZXID, a.ZXRQ, a.ZXXM, a.ZT, a.ZXZ, a.ZXLX, a.ZXYH, a.ZXGH,a.dept, a.ROLE_ID, b.ZMC, c.NAME, group_concat(d.NAME) as ZXLXNAME, f.name as areaname from a left join t_area f on a.dept=f.area_code left join TZXZ b on a.ZXZ=b.ID left join SYS_USER c on a.ZXYH=c.USERNAME left join SYS_DICTIONARIES d on find_in_set (d.DICTIONARIES_ID,a.ZXLX) where 1=1 and USERNAME = #{USERNAME} group by ID
